text: Sergey Viktorovich Lavrov (, ; born 21 March 1950) is a Russian diplomat. He has been the foreign minister of Russia since 2004. From 1994 to 2004, Lavrov was a Soviet diplomat, and the Permanent Representative of Russia to the United Nations. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Moscow Category:Russian diplomats
title: Sergey Lavrov
